reviewText:
This is my "most wanted TV doco"; it was broadcast many years ago on NZ TV. I never dreamed that one I would actually get to fly in the very same Catalina flying boat that features in the program. Infact, I had two short flights on the same day from our local airport. I even sat in the port-side blister, on our 20 minute, low altitude flights.

Thanks to Amazon I will get to view to doco and relive my flights again.
A valuable reference to the times and of interest to the general reader
